quote: The reason you do things changes the way you do things.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the conventional approach to goal setting and emphasizes intrinsic motivation.
suggested_hook: Why your goals might be holding you back more than helping you.

quote: My success is not predicated on the circumstances.
why_clipworthy: Offers a refreshing perspective on market fluctuations and personal agency.
suggested_hook: How to thrive in any market condition.
